contest-event.event-date:
Oct. 12, 2013 D Cornish Brass Band Championships
Cornish Brass Band Championships 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Cornwall Brass Band Association Contest cornish-brass-band-championships
None
Falmouth Methodist Church, Falmouth, Cornwall 58th contest HP First Section band receives the Leonard Hender Cup - St. Austell Town HP Second Section band receives the Chas. E Welsh Cup - St. Keverne Silver 2nd placed band receives the F Henwood Cup - Bugle Silver HP Junior Band receives the BBC Plymouth Sound Cup - St. Keverne Junior HP Training band receives the Asher Cup - Lanner Brass Academy 2nd placed receives the Thomas Reynolds - St. Dennis Training 3rd placed receives the EA Thomas Cup - Pendennis Youth & Training The ECC Revue Shield for best Cornet Section - St. Austell Town The Peter Bailey Shield for best Bass Section - St. Austell Youth The Brian Richards for best Solo Cornet - Hannah Hawken (St. Austell Town) The Roger Moyle Memorial Cup for best Euphonium - Paul Villers (St. Keverne Silver) The Ivan Kessel Memorial Salver for Player of the Day - Yasmin Stevens (St. Austell Town)
Oct. 13, 2013, 6:22 a.m. Oct. 13, 2013, 6:49 a.m.
1 St. Austell Town Band Aaron Harvey
2 St. Keverne Band Gareth Churcher
3 Bugle Silver Band Jeremy Wilcock
4 St. Keverne Youth Gareth Churcher
5 St. Austell Youth Mark Arnold
6 Lanner Brass Academy Philip Matthews
7 St. Keverne Youth Gareth Churcher
8 St Dennis Training Bianca Davies
9 Pendennis Youth/Training Glyn Thomas
